TitlePart.Title: To stand for election, you'll need to be nominated by at least 10 electors from the constituency you wish to represent. You must also pay a £500 deposit. This is returned to you if you get more than 5% of the total votes cast in your constituency.

Description.Html: To stand for election, you'll need to be nominated by at least 10 electors from the constituency you wish to represent. You must also pay a £500 deposit. This is returned to you if you get more than 5% of the total votes cast in your constituency.

data.DisplayText: To stand for election, you'll need to be nominated by at least 10 electors from the constituency you wish to represent. You must also pay a £500 deposit. This is returned to you if you get more than 5% of the total votes cast in your constituency.
data.Author: admin

TitlePart.Title: You'll also be expected to:have a smart appearance; have a valid passport with no restrictions for the countries the airline travels to; live within 90 minutes of your base; have good written and spoken English

Description.Html:
You'll also be expected to:

  • have a smart appearance
  • have a valid passport with no restrictions for the countries the airline travels to
  • live within 90 minutes of your base
  • have good written and spoken English

data.DisplayText: You'll also be expected to:have a smart appearance; have a valid passport with no restrictions for the countries the airline travels to; live within 90 minutes of your base; have good written and spoken English
data.Author: admin

TitlePart.Title: A driving licence may be helpful if you're going to be working on shifts outside of public transport hours.

TitlePart.Title: It will help to be physically fit, as you may need to help lift or move people.

TitlePart.Title: You may need a driving licence for some jobs.

TitlePart.Title: There are rules about height and weight - these vary between airlines. As a general guide, most look for people between 5ft 2in (157cm) and 6ft 2in (188cm) with weight in proportion to height.

Description.Html: There are rules about height and weight - these vary between airlines. As a general guide, most look for people between 5ft 2in (157cm) and 6ft 2in (188cm) with weight in proportion to height.

TitlePart.Title: Certain people are not allowed to stand as an MP, for example someone convicted of electoral fraud. You can check with the [Electoral Commission] for more information about this.

TitlePart.Title: To work with plant machinery like excavators or dumper trucks, you'll need to be 18 or over and have a driving licence.

TitlePart.Title: You'll usually need your own transport to get to and from work, as you may not be able to get public transport to suit your shift times.
